name: Solution Architect
description:
NVIDIA’s deep learning platform has already made a major impact to the field and is broadly used across leading academic institutions, start-ups, and industry, including the world’s largest Internet companies. We need passionate, hard-working and creative people to help us tackle more of these unique opportunities.

NVIDIA’s Worldwide Field Operations (WWFO) team is looking for world-class data scientists and engineers able to engage with developers, researchers, and start-ups, in multiple, impactful massive data analytics projects. We need individuals who can enable customer productivity and develop lasting relationships with our technology partners, making NVIDIA an integral part of end-user solutions. We are looking for someone always thinking about artificial intelligence, someone who can maintain synergy in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving field, someone able to coordinate efforts between corporate marketing, industry business development and engineering. You will be working with the latest AI architectures coupled with machine learning and Big Data analytics, enabling improved workflows and developing new, differentiated solutions.

What you'll be doing:

  • Assisting field business development in guiding the customer through the NVIDIA technologies, owning the technical relationship and assisting the customer in building innovative solutions based on NVIDIA technology

  • Be an industry thought leader on integrating NVIDIA technology into AI architectures to support applications

  • Establish and maintain relations with Open Data Science and other AI communities, create and promote NVIDIA best practices

  • Be a technical leader with key customer projects and products from NVIDIA side

  • Tracking news and trends in AI training and inference with further promotion and adoption at relevant customers

What we need to see:

  • BSc or similar in Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or Computer Science

  • 5+ years of work-related experience in software development or massive data analytics, CUDA experience highly desirable

  • Solid background with DL Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras

  • Solid background in the fields of NLP, CV, ASR

  • Strong knowledge in modern model architectures

  • Experience in data/model parallel training of neural networks and model inference

  • Action-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills

  • Strong skills in Python language, C/C++ is a good option

  • Strong written and oral communications skills with the ability to effectively interface with management and engineering

  • Experience with CatBoost, Xgboost, LightGBM, Hadoop/Spark, Docker, OpenShift, Kubernetes is highly desirable

NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers! We have some of the most forward-thinking and hardworking people in the world working for us. If you are creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you!
